headline: Top Valuation Expert Says AI Market Needs 'Trillions In Revenue' To Justify Valuations After Cashing Out Of Its Biggest Chipmaker
summary: Aswath Damodaran, the ‘Dean of Valuation,’ has issued a stark warning to AI investors that the math simply does not add up. Citing a massive disconnect between upfront infrastructure spending and future earnings, the NYU finance professor revealed he has fully exited his position in Nvidia Corp. (NASDAQ:NVDA) while maintaining his stake in Microsoft Corp. (NASDAQ:MSFT).
